Articles.Content:
Hi there!

This is not my first post on the forums, yea, I know, it should......

When I found out about KSP was late in 0.23, and oh my..... I would never imagined a game like this....it's....it's just perfect!

I love many kinds of games, but space sims are my favorite, I have been a long player of EVE Online and Star Trek Online.

But this time, KSP is the number 1...and then I found out what this amazing community do with mods! OH MY GOD!!!!

You guys are great, not just modders who make excellent work (yea i use mechjeb lol so shut up) but also the rest of the community. I have learn a lot of things just by reading the forums.

When I started to play KSP, a friend of mine got me a copy, (dont ask), I decided to buy the game because it is just wrong not to support indie companies, in particular, some like Squad who have made an amazing game.

Look forward to be here and get involved, I would love to mod, since i did it on other games, but here it sounds more complex.

Oh, in case you notice my strange English, is because I'm not English. I live in Portugal in place called Sintra. Google it and you love it.

Happy landings, cough, cough, crashes.

Fly safe.

WELCOME TO THE FORUMS!!!

We have snacks and rocket fuel for everyone!

WELCOME TO THE FORUMS!!!

We have snacks and rocket fuel for everyone!

Thank you!

I got my fill of rocket fuel last night.... I think i saw something on the mun....i think.....
Welcome, I've found this is the best community on the interweb... glad to have you on board.
